text: Lamine Fomba (born 26 January 1998) is a French professional footballer who plays for Nîmes Olympique as a midfielder. ==Club career== Fomba signed his first professional contract for Auxerre on 13 May 2016. Fomba made his professional debut for Auxerre in a 2–0 loss to AC Ajaccio on 20 September 2016 in the Ligue 2. ==International career== Fomba was born in France and is of Malian descent. Fomba represented the France national under-18 football team at the 2015 FIFA U-17 World Cup, making 2 appearances. ==References== ==External links== * * * Madeinfoot Profile Category:Living people Category:1998 births Category:Footballers from Paris Category:Association football midfielders Category:French footballers Category:France youth international footballers Category:French people of Malian descent Category:AJ Auxerre players Category:Nîmes Olympique players Category:Ligue 2 players Category:Ligue 1 players
title: Lamine Fomba
